verses.verse: "Dominion <S%H4910><s%> and fear <S%H6343><s%> are with him. <S%H6213><s%> He makes peace <S%H7965><s%> in his high places. <S%H4791><s%>
Can <S%H3426><s%> his armies <S%H1416><s%> be counted? <S%H4557><s%> On whom does his light <S%H216><s%> not arise? <S%H6965><s%>
How then can man <S%H582><s%> be just <S%H6663><s%> with God? <S%H410><s%> Or how can he who is born <S%H3205><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> be clean? <S%H2135><s%>
Behold, <S%H3394><s%> even the moon has no brightness, <S%H166><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%> are not pure <S%H2141><s%> in his sight; <S%H5869><s%>
How much less man, <S%H582><s%> who is a worm, <S%H7415><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> who is a worm! <S%H8438><s%>"
